extension.summary: Browse 1channel.ch
extension.description: Play a wide selection of movies and TV shows from PrimeWire.ag. ***This addon is supported at [COLOR blue]www.tvaddons.ag[/COLOR], [COLOR white][B]NOT[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR red]xbmc.org[/COLOR]. ***

extension.summary: The origins of streaming
extension.description: Visit TVADDONS.ag for support
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.summary: Live Streams
extension.description: To enable Clarkey Streams, Go into the settings, then Clarkey Streams and enable Browse and play from Clarkey Streams! You can also add your own xml file. Thus giving you a nice list with thumbnails, fanart, and media info if you like. For more info and instructions on how to use this add-on please visit the IPTV section of our website [COLOR blue]www.streamboxlive.wordpress.com[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Play videos of different sports streaming sites
extension.description: Play videos of different sports streaming sites

extension.summary: Free to view live streaming
extension.description: LIVE UK TV Channels. By using This Plugin You will receive all the UK TV for FREE. For more info and instructions go to the StreamBox Live page of our website [COLOR blue]www.streamboxlive.wordpress.com[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Cartoon HD
extension.description: Watch All Your Favourite Cartoons

extension.summary: WLIPTV
extension.description: NTV.mx have new servers for some countries so this is an edited version of ntv to work with new accounts. Stream all of your favourites sports, movies and tv from wliptv. For more info and instructions on how to use this add-on please visit the WLIPTV section of our website [COLOR blue]www.streamboxlive.wordpress.com[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Install MY Addons
extension.description: Download and install addons from uscclarkey. For more info please visit [COLOR blue]www.streamboxlive.wordpress.com[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Media Browser Addon for Kodi
extension.description: Navi-X is the oldest and most trusted add-on for Kodi, used by millions of people worldwide. You'll find everything from live television to your favourite movies and television shows, easily accessible.

extension.summary: Parental Controls
extension.description: A parental controls addon. Works only with sources that provide ratings such as HULU.
